amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute printed as amendment No. 1 in the Congressional Record of March 12, 1998 and considered as having been adopted pursuant to the unanimous consent agreement of March 12, 1998.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Campbell.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
